TITLE: About Live-Reporter
TITLE_MSG:
Live-Reporter is camera server application on iOS device.

The transmitted video and audio are played on PC or smartphone applications.

In addition, Live-Reporter can send to several media servers by announced push method.

This page is 'How to use for Live-Reporter'.
USE_CLIENT_APP: On demand stream by client application
USE_CLIENT_APP_MSG0: VLC player from Video LAN project is well known for the on demand stream player.
USE_CLIENT_APP_MSG1:
As below picture is Live-Reporter main screen.

You can check RTSP address on your iOS device.

The address label can be shown for other assigned IP address by your tapped operation.
USE_CLIENT_APP_MSG2:
Launch VLC player on your PC.

Select menu to 'File' -> 'Open Network'.
USE_CLIENT_APP_MSG3:
Open source dialog box is shown on display.

Input your Live-Reporter RTSP address.

(RTSP address is shown on Live-Reporter main screen.

You already checked on the screen.)

And then click 'Open' button.
USE_SERVER_PUSH: Server push from your iOS device
USE_SERVER_PUSH_MSG0:
The announce push method on Live-Reporter is supported by servral servers.

Ex. Apple corp. DarwinStreamingServer„ÄÅ

Wowza Media Server.
USE_SERVER_PUSH_MSG1:
On Live-Reporter main screen, these top text fields are

prepared for your media server address information.

(IP or name address, port number, streaming name (or application name))

Live-Reporter connect to your server by the “Connect” button.

About streaming name....

On wowza streaming server,

the streaming name are consisted of

application name, slash symbol and streaming name

(Ex. live/streamname).
USE_SERVER_PUSH_MSG2:
